credit_line: Museum purchase through Estate of Vena Tomkins Carroll and gift of Ely Jacques Kahn
title: Flower Bed
description: All-over floral and foliate design. Exotic flowers are brightly printed in shades of red, orange, yellow and purple. Interspersed are images of arms and hands severed from the body. Other, smaller-scale imagery inclued cubes and unidentifiable shapes. Printed in 11 colors on white ground.
name: Sidewall
